# manCTMed

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan 2025-12-15

## Description

Research compendium for the manuscript Pesigan, I. J. A., Russell, M.
A., & Chow, S.-M. (2025). Inferences and Effect Sizes for Direct,
Indirect, and Total Effects in Continuous-Time Mediation Models.
*Psychological Methods*. <https://doi.org/10.1037/met0000779>

## Acknowledgments

This research was made possible by the Prevention and Methodology
Training Program (PAMT) funded by a T32 training grant (T32 DA017629
Multiple Principal Investigators: Jennifer Maggs & Stephanie Lanza) from
the National Institute on Drug Abuse (NIDA), the National Institutes of
Health Intensive Longitudinal Health Behavior Cooperative Agreement
Program (U24AA027684), National Science Foundation (Grant DUE-2417294),
the National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences
(UL1TR002014-06), and the National Institute of Diabetes, Digestive &
Kidney Diseases (U01DK135126).

Computations for this research were performed on the Pennsylvania State
University’s Institute for Computational and Data Sciences’ Roar
supercomputer using SLURM for job scheduling (Yoo et al., 2003), GNU
Parallel to run the simulations in parallel (Tange, 2021), and Apptainer
to ensure a reproducible software stack (Kurtzer et al., 2017, 2021).
See `.sim/README.md` and the scripts in the `.sim` folder in the
[GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed) repository for more
details on how the simulations were performed.

## Installation

You can install `manCTMed` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed) with:

``` r

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jeksterslab/manCTMed")
```

See
[Containers](https://jeksterslab.github.io/manCTMed/articles/containers.html)
for containerized versions of the package.

## Author-Accepted Manuscript

See
<https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/blob/main/.setup/latex/manCTMed-manuscript.Rtex>
for the latex file of the manuscript. See
<https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/blob/latex/manCTMed-manuscript.pdf>
for the compiled PDF.

## R Package

Effect sizes, standard errors and confidence intervals for the direct,
indirect, and total effects for continuous-time mediation models as well
as visualization tools are available in the `cTMed` package available on
the Comprehensive R Archive Network (CRAN)
(<https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=cTMed>). Documentation and examples
can be found in the accompanying website
(<https://jeksterslab.github.io/cTMed>).

## More Information

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslab.github.io/manCTMed/index.html)
for package documentation.

# Package index

## Data Generation Functions

- [`GenData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/GenData.md)
  : Simulate Data
- [`IllustrationGenData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationGenData.md)
  : Simulate Data (Illustration)
- [`RandomMeasurement()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/RandomMeasurement.md)
  : Simulate Random Measurement

## Model Fitting Functions

- [`FitDynr()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/FitDynr.md)
  : Fit the Model using the dynr Package
- [`FitMx()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/FitMx.md)
  : Fit the Model using the OpenMx Package
- [`IllustrationFitDynr()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFitDynr.md)
  : Fit the Model using the dynr Package (Illustration)
- [`IllustrationFitMx()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFitMx.md)
  : Fit the Model using the OpenMx Package (Illustration)
- [`IllustrationMCPhiSigma()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationMCPhiSigma.md)
  : Generate a Sampling Distribution of Drift Matrices and Process Noise
  Covariance Matrices (Illustration)
- [`IllustrationPrepData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationPrepData.md)
  : Prepare Data Before Model Fitting (Illustration)
- [`PhiHat()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/PhiHat.md)
  : Estimated Drift Matrix
- [`ThetaHat()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/ThetaHat.md)
  : Estimated Drift Matrix and Process Noise

## Confidence Interval Functions

- [`BootPara()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootPara.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap
- [`BootParaStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootParaStdXMY.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap Confidence Intervals for X-M-Y (Standardized)
- [`BootParaStdXYM()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootParaStdXYM.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap Confidence Intervals for X-Y-M (Standardized)
- [`BootParaStdYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootParaStdYMX.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap Confidence Intervals for Y-M-X (Standardized)
- [`BootParaXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootParaXMY.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap Confidence Intervals for X-M-Y
- [`BootParaXYM()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootParaXYM.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap Confidence Intervals for X-Y-M
- [`BootParaYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootParaYMX.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap Confidence Intervals for Y-M-X
- [`DeltaStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/DeltaStdXMY.md)
  : Delta Method Confidence Intervals for X-M-Y (Standardized)
- [`DeltaStdXYM()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/DeltaStdXYM.md)
  : Delta Method Confidence Intervals for X-Y-M (Standardized)
- [`DeltaStdYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/DeltaStdYMX.md)
  : Delta Method Confidence Intervals for Y-M-X (Standardized)
- [`DeltaXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/DeltaXMY.md)
  : Delta Method Confidence Intervals for X-M-Y
- [`DeltaXYM()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/DeltaXYM.md)
  : Delta Method Confidence Intervals for X-Y-M
- [`DeltaYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/DeltaYMX.md)
  : Delta Method Confidence Intervals for Y-M-X
- [`IllustrationBootPara()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationBootPara.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap (Illustration)
- [`MCStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/MCStdXMY.md)
  : Monte Carlo Method Confidence Intervals for X-M-Y (Standardized)
- [`MCStdXYM()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/MCStdXYM.md)
  : Monte Carlo Method Confidence Intervals for X-Y-M (Standardized)
- [`MCStdYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/MCStdYMX.md)
  : Monte Carlo Method Confidence Intervals for Y-M-X (Standardized)
- [`MCXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/MCXMY.md)
  : Monte Carlo Method Confidence Intervals for X-M-Y
- [`MCXYM()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/MCXYM.md)
  : Monte Carlo Method Confidence Intervals for X-Y-M
- [`MCYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/MCYMX.md)
  : Monte Carlo Method Confidence Intervals for Y-M-X

## Illustration Functions

- [`IllustrationBootPara()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationBootPara.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap (Illustration)
- [`IllustrationFigScatterPlotCoverage()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFigScatterPlotCoverage.md)
  : Illustration Plot Coverage Probabilities
- [`IllustrationFigScatterPlotPower()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFigScatterPlotPower.md)
  : Illustration Plot Statistical Power
- [`IllustrationFigScatterPlotSeBias()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFigScatterPlotSeBias.md)
  : Illustration Plot Standard Error Bias
- [`IllustrationFitDynr()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFitDynr.md)
  : Fit the Model using the dynr Package (Illustration)
- [`IllustrationFitMx()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFitMx.md)
  : Fit the Model using the OpenMx Package (Illustration)
- [`IllustrationGenData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationGenData.md)
  : Simulate Data (Illustration)
- [`IllustrationMCPhiSigma()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationMCPhiSigma.md)
  : Generate a Sampling Distribution of Drift Matrices and Process Noise
  Covariance Matrices (Illustration)
- [`IllustrationPrepData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationPrepData.md)
  : Prepare Data Before Model Fitting (Illustration)
- [`SimIllustration()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustration.md)
  : Simulation Replication (Illustration)
- [`SimIllustrationDynrBootPara()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationDynrBootPara.md)
  : Simulation Replication - BootPara
- [`SimIllustrationDynrBootParaStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationDynrBootParaStdXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - BootParaStdXMY
- [`SimIllustrationDynrBootParaXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationDynrBootParaXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - BootParaXMY
- [`SimIllustrationDynrDeltaStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationDynrDeltaStdXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - Illustration (DynrDeltaStdXMY)
- [`SimIllustrationDynrDeltaXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationDynrDeltaXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - Illustration (DynrDeltaXMY)
- [`SimIllustrationDynrMCPhiSigma()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationDynrMCPhiSigma.md)
  : Simulation Replication - Illustration (MCPhiSigma)
- [`SimIllustrationDynrMCStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationDynrMCStdXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - Illustration (DynrMCStdXMY)
- [`SimIllustrationDynrMCXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationDynrMCXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - Illustration (DynrMCXMY)
- [`SimIllustrationFitDynr()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationFitDynr.md)
  : Simulation Replication - IllustrationFitDynr
- [`SimIllustrationFitMx()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationFitMx.md)
  : Simulation Replication - IllustrationFitMx
- [`SimIllustrationGenData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationGenData.md)
  : Simulation Replication - IllustrationGenData
- [`SimIllustrationPara()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimIllustrationPara.md)
  : Simulation Replication Parametric Bootstrap (Parallel)
- [`SumIllustration()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumIllustration.md)
  : Summary (Illustration)
- [`SumIllustrationDynrBootParaStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumIllustrationDynrBootParaStdXMY.md)
  : Summary - Illustration (DynrBootParaStdXMY)
- [`SumIllustrationDynrBootParaXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumIllustrationDynrBootParaXMY.md)
  : Summary - Illustration (DynrBootParaXMY)
- [`SumIllustrationDynrDeltaStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumIllustrationDynrDeltaStdXMY.md)
  : Summary - Illustration (DynrDeltaStdXMY)
- [`SumIllustrationDynrDeltaXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumIllustrationDynrDeltaXMY.md)
  : Summary - Illustration (DynrDeltaXMY)
- [`SumIllustrationDynrMCStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumIllustrationDynrMCStdXMY.md)
  : Summary - Illustration (DynrMCStdXMY)
- [`SumIllustrationDynrMCXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumIllustrationDynrMCXMY.md)
  : Summary - Illustration (DynrMCXMY)
- [`SumIllustrationFitDynr()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumIllustrationFitDynr.md)
  : Summary - Illustration (FitDynr)
- [`illustration_dist`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution
- [`illustration_dist_dt`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_dt.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Discrete Time - Time Interval of
  1
- [`illustration_dist_dt_mc`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_dt_mc.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Discrete Time - Time Interval of
  1 (Monte Carlo Method)
- [`illustration_dist_mc`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_mc.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution (Monte Carlo Method)
- [`illustration_dist_med`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_med.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Total, Direct, and Indirect
  Effects - Time Interval of 1
- [`illustration_dist_med_mc`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_med_mc.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Total, Direct, and Indirect
  Effects - Time Interval of 1 (Monte Carlo Method)
- [`illustration_dist_med_std`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_med_std.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Standardized Total, Direct, and
  Indirect Effects - Time Interval of 1
- [`illustration_dist_med_std_mc`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_med_std_mc.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Standardized Total, Direct, and
  Indirect Effects - Time Interval of 1 (Monte Carlo Method)
- [`illustration_results`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_results.md)
  : Illustration Small Scale Simulation Results

## Simulation Functions

- [`Sim()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/Sim.md) :
  Simulation Replication
- [`SimDynrBootPara()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrBootPara.md)
  : Simulation Replication - BootPara

  : Simulation Replication - BootParaStdXMY
- [`SimDynrBootParaStdYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrBootParaStdYMX.md)
  : Simulation Replication - BootParaStdYMX
- [`SimDynrBootParaXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrBootParaXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - BootParaXMY

  : Simulation Replication - BootParaYMX
- [`SimDynrDeltaStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrDeltaStdXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - DynrDeltaStdXMY
- [`SimDynrDeltaStdYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrDeltaStdYMX.md)
  : Simulation Replication - DynrDeltaStdYMX
- [`SimDynrDeltaXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrDeltaXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - DynrDeltaXMY
- [`SimDynrDeltaYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrDeltaYMX.md)
  : Simulation Replication - DynrDeltaYMX
- [`SimDynrMCStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrMCStdXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - DynrMCStdXMY
- [`SimDynrMCStdYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrMCStdYMX.md)
  : Simulation Replication - DynrMCStdYMX
- [`SimDynrMCXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrMCXMY.md)
  : Simulation Replication - DynrMCXMY
- [`SimDynrMCYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimDynrMCYMX.md)
  : Simulation Replication - DynrMCYMX
- [`SimFN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimFN.md)
  : Simulation File Name
- [`SimFitDynr()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimFitDynr.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitDynr
- [`SimFitMx()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimFitMx.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitMx
- [`SimGenData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimGenData.md)
  : Simulation Replication - GenData
- [`SimPara()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimPara.md)
  : Simulation Replication Parametric Bootstrap (Parallel)
- [`SimProj()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SimProj.md)
  : Simulation Project Name
- [`Sum()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/Sum.md) :
  Summary
- [`SumDynrDeltaStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumDynrDeltaStdXMY.md)
  : Summary (DynrDeltaStdXMY)
- [`SumDynrDeltaStdYMX()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumDynrDeltaStdYMX.md)
  : Summary (DynrDeltaStdYMX)

  : Summary (DynrDeltaXMY)

  : Summary (DynrDeltaYMX)

  : Summary (DynrMCStdXMY)

  : Summary (DynrMCStdYMX)

  : Summary (DynrMCXMY)

  : Summary (DynrMCYMX)

  : Summary (FitDynr)

  : Summary - Illustration (DynrMCXMY)
- [`SumIllustrationFitDynr()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/SumIllustrationFitDynr.md)
  : Summary - Illustration (FitDynr)

## Compression Functions

- [`Compress()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/Compress.md)
  : Compress Replication
- [`IllustrationCompress()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationCompress.md)
  : Compress Replication (Illustration)

## Data

- [`illustration_dist`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution
- [`illustration_dist_dt`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_dt.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Discrete Time - Time Interval of
  1
- [`illustration_dist_dt_mc`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_dt_mc.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Discrete Time - Time Interval of
  1 (Monte Carlo Method)
- [`illustration_dist_mc`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_mc.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution (Monte Carlo Method)
- [`illustration_dist_med`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_med.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Total, Direct, and Indirect
  Effects - Time Interval of 1
- [`illustration_dist_med_mc`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_med_mc.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Total, Direct, and Indirect
  Effects - Time Interval of 1 (Monte Carlo Method)
- [`illustration_dist_med_std`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_med_std.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Standardized Total, Direct, and
  Indirect Effects - Time Interval of 1
- [`illustration_dist_med_std_mc`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_dist_med_std_mc.md)
  : Illustration Sampling Distribution Standardized Total, Direct, and
  Indirect Effects - Time Interval of 1 (Monte Carlo Method)
- [`illustration_results`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/illustration_results.md)
  : Illustration Small Scale Simulation Results
- [`params`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/params.md)
  : Simulation Parameters
- [`results`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/results.md)
  : Simulation Results

## Figures

- [`FigPlotEffects()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/FigPlotEffects.md)
  : Plot Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects
- [`FigScatterPlotCoverage()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/FigScatterPlotCoverage.md)
  : Plot Coverage Probabilities
- [`FigScatterPlotPower()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/FigScatterPlotPower.md)
  : Plot Statistical Power
- [`FigScatterPlotSeBias()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/FigScatterPlotSeBias.md)
  : Plot Standard Error Bias
- [`FigScatterPlotType1()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/FigScatterPlotType1.md)
  : Plot Type I Error
- [`IllustrationFigPlotEffects()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFigPlotEffects.md)
  : Plot Total, Direct, and Indirect Effects (Illustration)
- [`IllustrationFigScatterPlotCoverage()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFigScatterPlotCoverage.md)
  : Illustration Plot Coverage Probabilities
- [`IllustrationFigScatterPlotPower()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFigScatterPlotPower.md)
  : Illustration Plot Statistical Power
- [`IllustrationFigScatterPlotSeBias()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/IllustrationFigScatterPlotSeBias.md)
  : Illustration Plot Standard Error Bias

## All Functions

- [`BootPara()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootPara.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap
- [`BootParaStdXMY()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootParaStdXMY.md)
  : Parametric Bootstrap Confidence Intervals for X-M-Y (Standardized)
- [`BootParaStdXYM()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/reference/BootParaStdXYM.md)

# Articles

### manCTMed

- [Inferences and Effect Sizes for Direct, Indirect, and Total Effects
  in Continuous-Time Mediation
  Models](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/articles/manCTMed.md):

### Three Illustrations Using an Empirical Data Set

- [Illustration 1 - Direct, Indirect, and Total
  Effects](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/articles/fig-example-1.md):
- [Illustration 2 - Confidence Intervals for the Direct, Indirect, and
  Total
  Effects](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/articles/fig-example-2.md):
- [Illustration 3 - Regions of
  Significance](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/articles/fig-example-3.md):

- [Single Replication from the Simulation
  Study](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/articles/replication.md):

- [Simulation
  Parameters](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCTMed/articles/params.md):
